DOC.brief_summary: The study focus survivorship care head neck cancer patient care within Duke Cancer Center clinic . Standardized survivorship care plan ( sSCP ) implement base American Society Clinical Oncology 's criterion . These document provide summary treatment receive , list side effect follow-up information cancer treatment . Taking advantage transition , investigator study three group patient : ( ) early survivor treat sSCP implement , ( b ) early survivor treat sSCP implement , ( c ) current patient receive individualize enhanced SCP ( eSCP ) , include additional information tailor patient preference . The investigator hypothesize patient receive enhance survivorship care plan increase knowledge regard health care plan wellness trajectory ; increase ability identify symptom likely expect result cancer treatment ; likely engage conversation PCP healthy behavior screen guideline .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Survivorship Care Plans Head Neck Cancer
DOC.criteria: Completed treatment head neck cancer Duke Cancer Center within 4 month consent OR Will complete treatment head neck cancer Duke Cancer Center within 3 week consent AND Able read understand English Capable give informed consent Are least age 18. incompetent interview ( documented diagnosis active psychosis dementia ) unable provide inform consent assess interviewer ; sick participate , judged member research team
